en_question: A large swimming pool with a volume of \(8908\) liters initially contains water with \(77\%\) chlorine. Fresh water containing \(0.17\%\) chlorine is pumped into the pool at a rate of \(7\) liters per minute, and the well-stirred mixture is drained from the pool at the same rate to maintain its volume. What will be the percentage of chlorine in the pool after 2 minutes? Express your answer to five significant figures.
